name: Princess hair salon - beautiful girl haircut
name_original: Princess hair salon - beautiful girl haircut
description:
Do you want to be a hairstylist? Check out the various hairstyles in this Hair Salon game.

Makeup the girl first, and then use a variety of hair cutting tools, coloring agents, ornaments, to give our lovely little princess design your eyes satisfied with the hair.

It is a very fun game.
Try it now.
